entry.title: Reliance TF201W 20A Easy/Tran Furnace Transfer Switch - Gray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Reliance
Type: Transfer Switches
Price: 139.99

Features
  • The Easy/Tran TF transfer switch is designed for the control of a single circuit, such as a forced-air furnace, in the event of a power failure.
  • The attached 18" flexible aluminum conduit is pre-wired and allows the TF to be easily connected at the circuit breaker panel or the furnace or at any point in between.
  • Power can be supplied from a portable generator, inverter, RV generator, fuel cell or any standby source capable of producing sufficient current to operate the desired load.
  • Uses standard grounded extension cord.
What's in The Box
  • Easy/Tran Transfer Switch - TF201W
  • Owner's Manual
Warranty
  • 30-Day Satisfaction Guaranteed

Brand Reliance

Max. single-pole circuits 1
Max. double-pole circuits 0

entry.title: Reliance PBN20 20 Amp NEMA 3R PBN Series Non-Metallic Power Inlet Box
entry.summary:
Vendor: Reliance
Type: Transfer Switches
Price: 48.99

Features
  • The raintight NEMA 3R PBN Series non-metallic power inlet box is designed for use with the Pro/Tran transfer switches and Panel/Link manual transfer panels and generator-ready load centers.
  • This power inlet box must be installed outdoors in an open area where the generator is being used.
  • Using one of the three ¾-inch knockouts (one each on the sides and back) the power inlet box can be wired directly to the transfer switch or panel.
  • The patented design provides over 100 cubic inches of wiring space and the slide-out base allows easy 360° access to the flanged inlet.

Vendor: Reliance
Type: Transfer Switches

Features
  • Pro/Tran 2 50A 10-Circuit 120/240V Outdoor Manual Transfer Switch
  • The next generation of Load side manual transfer switches
  • Non-Defeat able (Break-Before-Make) Double-Throw Switch
  • Eliminates dangerous back feeds and electrical overloads
  • 10 Total Circuits (1") Interchangeable Style)
  • (1) 20A 2-pole, (2) 20A 1-pole and (6) 15A 1-pole
  • NEW Color-Coded Built-In Analog Wattmeter

  • Easily connect your generator cord on bottom of switch
  • NEMA 3R Powder-Coated Steel Cabinet For Outdoor Installation
  • Gasketed design, provides liquid tight protection in all seasons
  • Key lockable door prevents tampering and unauthorized use
  • 16" Flexible, Non-Metallic Liquid-Tight Conduit (1") w/ Fittings
  • (5) Combination 1/2" and 3/4" knockouts for easier installation
  • Factory-marked, color-coded wires simplifies installation
  • Safety and Certifications
  • Certified for use by Underwriter Laboratories to UL Standard 1008

entry.title: Reliance XRH0303D 30 Amp 6/12 Circuit Panel/Link Utility Transfer Panel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Reliance
Type: Transfer Switches
Price: 369.99

Features
  • The Reliance Panel/Link X Series is a double-pole manual transfer switch with an exclusive third-pole for the neutral that switches sequentially.
  • The X Series is perfect for use with generators having GFCI protected outlets, bonded neutral generators and installations requiring a separately-derived system.
  • On GFCI protected generators, the X Series will prevent a ground fault which will, in turn, prevent the circuit breakers on the generator from nuisance tripping.
  • The XRH Series has 6 branch circuit spaces and will allow up to 12 circuits with the use of tandem breakers.
What's in The Box
  • 30 Amp 6/12 Circuit Panel/Link Transfer Panel
  • Owner's Manual
